tag_list: html, css, iphone, flash, design, web, photoshop
overview:
On his never-ending quest for knowledge, Robert has gained many acknowledgements during his studies. Graduating from Pittsburgh Technical Institute with a Specialized Mutlimedia Associate Degree, Robert was also awarded the January 2005 Richard S. Caliguiri Renaissance Award of his graduating class (awarded for the excellence in leadership and perseverance). He also acquired the Brainbench.com Macromedia Flash MX 2004 Certification.

Robert enjoys creative hobbies such as creating patterns and vector presets for Adobe Photoshop, iPhone / iPod Touch webApps and Widgets, as well as creating icon and desktop sets. Robert has been making Flash games and applications over the years, creating variables and objects. Lately, Robert has been looking into iPhone development, CSS 3, as well as HTML 5.

degrees.subject: Web Design, Animation, Video Editing, Design
